ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: sorry about that, I guess I wasnt paying attention. So scratch my last post with Hell Beast and his team storming out of the base. ... begged! ... access

OOC: sorry about that, I guess I wasnt paying attention. So scratch my last 
post with Hell Beast and his team storming out of the base. 

::: Hell Beast looks at Inferno, Rampage, and Black Aracnia freash out of the 
CR tank. :::

::: Hell Beast ::: What do you have to say for yourselfs?

::: Inferno ::: Royalty! I tried to tell them, but they refused to listen! I 
begged!

::: Hell Beast ::: Inferno Shut Up! Black Aracnia, what happened?

::: The fembot answered cool as a cucumber ::: We went to download Maximal 
access codes from there computer, but the internal defenses got the better of 
us. It looks as if they invested alot more in them.

::: Hell Beast rubs his chin, ::: I see...

::: Inferno ::: My Queen, we could have succeeded, but this female disobeyed 
me. She should burn!

::: Hell Beast ::: Mabey later, for now im expecting company so contact our 
group at the tower and let them know we might need them.

::: Black Aracnia says as she sits at her station ::: ...unless the Newcomers 
are going to attack there instead to try and take the tower from us.

::: Hell Beast gritted his teeth ::: Damn it! Tell them to be on the alert, I 
dont want any foul ups!

~~~~~~~~~~

::: Megatron looks to Scorpinox ::: Yes, send a cyberbee. For now, I have a 
reprograming to do.

::: Ra is strapped to a table, unable to move. Waspinator hits him with his 
small insect amrs, laughing. :::

::: Megatron ::: Dont worry, first we will remove a portion of your spark, 
and then we wil lreprogram you.

::: Ra suddenly goes limp, and the process begins :::

~~~~~~~~

::: Transanulas, Pheniox, Marine, and Gremlin look at the tower, and then to 
Transanulas :::

::: Marine ::: A wepon?

::: Transanulas ::: Yes, I already explained it to her, I dont see why you 
wont let me do it!??

::: Marine ::: Hell Beast wouldnt like it, we should ask him first.

::: Gremlin ::: I just got word from him we might be under attack, I think we 
should postpone this little project.

::: Transanulas ::: If there is going to be an attack, its more a reason to 
modify the tower!

::: Marine thinks a moment ::: No, we will stand our ground for now. After 
whatever comes our way, we will decided.

~~~~~~~~

::: Ra sturs, and then rises. He looks to Megatron who is holding some kind 
of device containing a glowing orb. :::

::: Ra ::: Megatron? Why do I feel like...like im dazed and confused?

::: Megatron ::: All part of the spark removeal surgury. You see, I cut out a 
peice of your spark and I will crush it and cause you pain and suffering if 
you dont listen to me. 

::: Waspinator ::: And then we will reprogram birdy bot!

::: Megatron ::: Ah yes. I will reprogram you to serve me. And hold you 
hostage with this spark. If they try to get you, I will kill you. Its simple. 
As of now, I am your master!

::: Ra tries to say something, but falls into darkness. :::
